text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ”It's beautiful, yes. But it's important to always be lit as a symbol.” Pres smiles at me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I don't remember. But why does that lead to 'breathing'?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's frustrating, isn't it? The person closest to the tower doesn't know how high or shining it is. Even if they understand it to be functional.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: However, that light must be captivating to those who are attracted to it. In that case, we should be able to achieve more results than Pres envisioned―

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I can't help but gasp as I create a symbol. It's the light that holds hope for Pres.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I see. That's right. You're… the Empress.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hmph, it's too late for that? If you get it, don't underestimate me again. Honestly, everyone treats me like a fragile flower.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (…There's someone to compete with in the air groove, vodka, and Scarlet. But I…)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Looks like it's better than this morning. Laurel, what kind of magic did you use?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I didn't do much magic! I just told her what I felt.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I see. Well, I don't mind if you leave me alone. I'll go back to Academy and finish this last bit. Christmas is coming up—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I know. I have to say something. But…… what, how should I tell her?!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (I have to do my job perfectly. It's for the sake of my work. All I have to do is apologize… and yet…)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (―If her words were true, I wouldn't be afraid of that……)

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: ――Merry Crismers! We're here, Christmas! There's a special light at Harron Tower tonight!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: This year's official ambassadors are these two! Daiwa Scarlet, Vodka!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: It's a diwascarlet! It's an honor to be able to light up Haron Tower!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Woohoo! Look forward to it! It's so bright!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: Yes, thank you very much! May I ask you to explain why you two were hired?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …It's to make the event a perfect match!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: Thank you! The design of the lights reminds me of two Santas running through the sky.

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: Two lights race up the tower, and when they reach the top, the whole tower lights up!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: This will be a memorable Christmas! I can't wait, Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, y-yeah! We're going to keep going until the light-up ceremony! Let's make today the best Christmas ever!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: (Scarlet was the one who told me the reason why the official ambassador was hired. If Vodka was able to back her up, does that mean she's back to normal?)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (I have to say it. I have to thank her for backing me up!)

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Oh, Santa in pants! We'd like to go to the observation deck at Harron Tower. How do we get there?

text_block_list.name: Girl B
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's cold! That's enough, let's hurry inside, okay? Or, hold on tight right now♪

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Geez, it can't be helped. C'mon, squeeze! ♪ So, Santa, where's the gazebo?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …?! Uh, ah, um…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You can take the elevator from the first floor! But I recommend the outside stairs!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Oh, right, the stairs at Haron Tower are famous. There are two spiral staircases, right?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yes! No matter which way you climb, you can see the beautiful scenery. But it's best to go early!

text_block_list.name: Girl B
text_block_list.text: Whyyy?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: We're going to lock it down for the lights tonight. The outside stairs are designed to be lit by people's sensory sensors, but…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's like you're programming that sensor to light up from below.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Crap, that's definitely pretty! Well, I guess I'll climb the stairs and watch over you at night. Thanks for showing me the way!

text_block_list.name: Girl B
text_block_list.text: Hey, aren't those two cute? They're in perfect sync… Just like us, hehe～

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: ――Well then, it's time for the lighting ceremony! Please stand by!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Hey…! Hey…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You two ready now?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …What's with that reaction? Come quickly. There's trouble.

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: ――I can't light it up!?

text_block_list.name: Event Manager
text_block_list.text: Specifically, there was a problem with the program that controlled the outside stairs' sensory sensors. There was no hope of fixing it before the lighting ceremony……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Does that mean the light doesn't run up the stairs, and it just lights up normally? That's kind of sad…

text_block_list.name: Event Manager
text_block_list.text: I'm terribly sorry! I'm terribly sorry, too… I can't believe I couldn't show you two a performance with Santa, the horsegirl who ran up the tower.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I ran up…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Excuse me! Even if the program isn't working, the sensor that turns on the lights will still work, right?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I see! Then…!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: We're gonna be Santa! We're gonna be Santa!
